statements: UPDATE team_performance SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE team_performance SET goals_scored = 30, league_standings = 3 WHERE team_id = 2;
UPDATE team_performance SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE team_performance SET goals_scored = 25, league_standings = 3 WHERE team_name = 'FC Barcelona';
UPDATE league_standings SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE match_results SET result = 'Win', goals_scored = 3 WHERE match_id = 1001;
UPDATE league_standings SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE team_id = 1
UPDATE match_results SET result = 'Draw', goals_scored = 2 WHERE opponent_id = 3
UPDATE league_standings SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
UPDATE team_stats SET goals_scored = 20, games_played = 5 WHERE team_name = 'Team B';
UPDATE league_standings SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE team_name = 'Team Alpha';
UPDATE team_stats SET goals_scored = 25, games_played = 12 WHERE team_name = 'Team Bravo';
UPDATE league_standings SET total_wins = 10, total_losses = 5 WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
UPDATE goals_scored SET goals_scored = 50, team_name = 'Team B', season_year = 2022;
UPDATE league_standings SET total_wins = total_wins + 1, total_goals_scored = total_goals_scored + 3 WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
UPDATE wins SET wins = wins + 1 WHERE team_name = 'Team B' AND season_year = 2022;
UPDATE LeagueStandings SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
UPDATE Teams SET total_wins = total_wins + 2, total_losses = total_losses + 1 WHERE team_name = 'Team B';
UPDATE LeagueStandings SET wins = wins + 1, losses = losses - 1 WHERE team_id = 1234;
UPDATE Teams SET total_wins = total_wins + 2 WHERE team_id = 5678;
